title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - What you've been waiting for: Oracle Exadata in AWS data center​ (DAT210)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 您期待已久的服务：AWS 数据中心中的 Oracle Exadata (DAT210)
abstract: With Oracle Database@AWS you can now migrate the most demanding Oracle-based enterprise workloads into AWS. We've placed database-optimized, resilient Oracle Exadata hardware directly in AWS data centers for low-latency, high-speed, secure access to your AWS applications. This lets you bring mission-critical workloads into AWS and extend them with the capabilities of Amazon Bedrock, Amazon Q, and more. You'll learn about commercial benefits and value propositions from Oracle and Amazon product management specialists, and hear first-hand experience from one of our launch customers who will share lessons learned and best practices. This presentation is brought to you by Oracle, an AWS Partner.​
abstract_cn: 借助 Oracle Database@AWS，您现在可以将要求最苛刻的基于 Oracle 的企业工作负载迁移到 AWS。我们将经过数据库优化的弹性 Oracle Exadata 硬件直接部署在 AWS 数据中心内，以实现对您的 AWS 应用程序的低延迟、高速、安全访问。这使您能够将关键任务工作负载引入 AWS，并通过 Amazon Bedrock、Amazon Q 等功能对其进行扩展。您将了解来自 Oracle 和 Amazon 产品管理专家的商业利益和价值主张，并听取我们一位首发客户的第一手经验分享，他们将分享经验教训和最佳实践。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Oracle 提供。
